page.title: 06THE SEWAGE WORKS, EXMOUTH
page.content: On Tuesday 18th of June we interviewed a man at the sewage works. He was cleaning out one of the big tanks.He said they had to be cleaned out once a week.There were 3 tanks all 10 foot deep. The sewage after its processed goes into the sea by Straight Point. It attracts fish, gulls and fishermen. The man said he likes his job. The tank is round. A bridge revolves around it. It has brushes attached and they sweep the bottom as the bridge goes round. The bridge is run by electric. Also there is a big water fall in the middle.
